Package com.globaltcad.swingtree

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SimpleDelegate<C extends javax.swing.JComponent,​E>
    Instances of this are passed to action lambdas for UI components to give an action more context information.
    SplitItem<I extends javax.swing.JMenuItem>
    An immutable data carrier exposing everything needed to configure an item of a JSplitButton.
    SplitItem.Delegate<I extends javax.swing.JMenuItem>
    Instances of this are exposed as delegates through the SimpleDelegate passed to the actions supplied to SplitItem.onSelection(UIAction) in order to give said actions all the necessary context they need to perform whatever action they so desire.
    Tab
    An immutable data carrier exposing everything needed to configure a tab of a JTabbedPane.
    UI
    This class is a static API for exposing swing tree builder types for wrapping and assembling various JComponent types to form a UI tree.
    UI.TestWindow
    Use this to quickly create and inspect a tes window for a UI component.
    UIForAbstractButton<I,​B extends javax.swing.AbstractButton>
    The following is a more specialized type of builder which extends the "BasicBuilder" class and provides additional features associated with the more specialized "AbstractButton" Swing component type.
    UIForAbstractEditorPane<I,​C extends javax.swing.JEditorPane>  
    UIForAbstractSwing<I,​C extends javax.swing.JComponent>
    A swing tree builder node for any kind JComponent instance.
    UIForAbstractTextComponent<I,​C extends javax.swing.text.JTextComponent>
    A swing tree builder node for JTextComponent instances.
    UIForAbstractTextComponent.AbstractDelegate  
    UIForAbstractTextComponent.InsertDelegate  
    UIForAbstractTextComponent.RemoveDelegate  
    UIForAbstractTextComponent.ReplaceDelegate  
    UIForAnything<T>
    A swing tree builder node for anything.
    UIForButton<B extends javax.swing.AbstractButton>
    A swing tree builder node for AbstractButton sub-type instances, usually the JButton type.
    UIForCheckBox<B extends javax.swing.JCheckBox>

  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    UI.Align
    Vertical or horizontal alignment.
    UI.Cursor
    An enum set of all the available swing cursors which map to the cursor type id.
    UI.HorizontalAlignment
    Different positions along a horizontally aligned UI component.
    UI.HorizontalDirection  
    UI.OverflowPolicy
    Overflow policy of UI components.
    UI.Position
    The position of a UI component in terms of directions.
    UI.ScrollBarPolicy
    The scroll policy for UI components with scroll behaviour.
    UI.VerticalAlignment
    Different positions along a vertically aligned UI component.
